mainEntityOfPage.description: SFTP Data Sync streamlines fleet management by automating route planning through secure file transfers. Your system simply uploads address data to our SFTP server, which automatically optimizes routes using your predefined settings and returns the optimized route filesâ€”all with enterprise-grade encryption. This solution requires no API integration, coding, or training, making it ideal for businesses with legacy systems, busy IT departments, or complex ERP environments. Compatible with AS/400, SAP, Microsoft Dynamics, NetSuite, and virtually any system capable of CSV export, it offers a frictionless path to route optimization regardless of your technical infrastructure.

offers.description: Contact our enterprise solutions team for custom pricing based on your organization's scale and integration requirements.

additionalProperty.name: Security Features
additionalProperty.value: End-to-end encryption, encrypted data at rest, comprehensive transaction logging and auditing, secure IP whitelisting

additionalProperty.name: Cross-Platform Support
additionalProperty.value: Works universally on Mac, Windows, Linux servers, compatible with any standard SFTP client

featureList: Secure encrypted file upload/download through industry-standard SFTP protocol
Enterprise-grade data encryption at rest for sensitive fleet information
Comprehensive transaction logging for security compliance and auditing
Multiple route processing templates for departmental or schedule-based optimization
Full compatibility with all Route4Me optimization settings and algorithms
Rapid route processing without web interface dependencies
Seamless connectivity with any standard SFTP client across operating systems
Zero-code integration with legacy systems, ERPs, and databases
Automated workflow with no manual intervention required
Universal compatibility with AS/400, SAP, Microsoft Dynamics, and mainframes
Firewall-friendly implementation with secure IP whitelisting options
Complete elimination of training requirements for route planning staff

aggregateRating.description: The weighted aggregate rating was calculated using ratings from multiple platforms (weighted by review count and platform credibility): Google Play (4.3, 14544 reviews, weight 0.7), Apple App Store (4.6, 10700 reviews, weight 1.5), Capterra (4.4, 390 reviews, weight 4.0) and G2 (4.6, 102 reviews, weight 5.0). Google Play and Apple App Store contribute the largest volumes but are user-driven, with Google Play subject to strong influence from competitive manipulation and Apple App Store benefiting from a more curated environment. Capterra provides professional, business-oriented reviews and G2's highly trusted platform ensures its smaller volume has significant influence. This weighting balances volume, trust and relevance.
